Name: Frequency of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ compared to \SW-Reviewer Agreed\
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of manuscripts that proceed to \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ after \SW-EIC Accept\
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Number of times \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ occurs after \First Look-Your updates are overdue\

Name: Percentage of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ occurrences out of all activities in the review process
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ as the final step before \Manuscript Export Succeeded\
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' occurs

Name: Ratio of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ occurrences to \SW-AE Assign Reviewers\ activities
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Percentage of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ in manuscripts that required major revision versus minor revision
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Frequency of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ in relation to the total number of manuscripts processed
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of manuscripts that enter \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ without requiring \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all cases where 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' does not happen

Name: Number of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ activities that follow \First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation\
Metric: Number of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' activities for cases where activity 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs

Name: Ratio of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ over \SW-Checklist Completed\ to assess efficiency in the review process
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Percentage of \Awaiting Assignment to Batch\ occurrences that lead to \Manuscript Export Succeeded\ within a specific timeframe
Metric: Percentage of 'Awaiting Assignment to Batch' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'
